name: ContraceptiveImplantLOINC
title: Contraceptive Implant LOINC
description: For Contraceptive eCQMs Approval for Trial Use application in Spring 2022; This set contains LOINC codes for contraceptive implants.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Family planning - provision and use of most and moderately effective contraceptive methods, access to long-acting reversible contraception (LARC)),(Data Element Scope: LOINC codes for contraceptive implant, a moderately effective method of contraception),(Inclusion Criteria: LOINC codes for contraceptive implant, a moderately effective method of contraception),(Exclusion Criteria: Any contraceptive method that is not an implant; Most effective (i.e., sterilization, IUDs/IUSs) or moderately effective (i.e., injectables, oral pills, patch, or ring) methods of contraception; Less effective methods of contraception (i.e., diaphragm, male condom, female condom, withdrawal, sponge, fertility-awareness based methods, spermicide).)
